fr.dogstellar.core

Class Potion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dogstellar.core.Stuff
      • fr.dogstellar.core.Potion

  • public class Potion
extends Stuff
    This class represent a potion which add life point when drunk. LifePoint must be between 1 and 13. If a wrong value is given, the lifePoint is initialized to 1.
    Version:
    (01)
    Author:
    (G3)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Potion(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int point)
      Potion Constructor Initialize a potion object The name and the description is managed by the info class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drinkPotion(Player player)
      Method drinkPotion Add life points to the perso’s life and remove the potion from the perso’s inventory.
      int getLifePoint()
      Method getNbPotion return the lifePoint given by the potion

    • Constructor Detail

      • Potion

        public Potion(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String description,
              int point)
        Potion Constructor Initialize a potion object The name and the description is managed by the info class. If the point is inferior to 0 or superior to 13, the lifePoint given is initialized to 1.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the potion
        description - the description of the potion
        point - the life point given by the potion

    • Method Detail

      • drinkPotion

        public void drinkPotion(Player player)
        Method drinkPotion Add life points to the perso’s life and remove the potion from the perso’s inventory.
        Parameters:
        perso - the perso which drink potion

      • getLifePoint

        public int getLifePoint()
        Method getNbPotion return the lifePoint given by the potion
        Returns:
        the number of health point given
